name: Add new Sellsy contacts to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new contact has been added to Sellsy, Make will automatically find this contact in Sellsy internal systems and add a new row in a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Uv_43iDEKi-3C4LNUKljaqtDSEnHf3tW_WF5iufLEp8/edit?usp=sharing).
